summary: Diff implements a new Prompt Studio mode with prompt input + examples, deterministic prompt analysis, local/rule-based content generation (title/message/footer with WishMint branding), a detected-style UI summary, an editor panel (edit text + tone + regenerate), eventâ†’theme auto-recommendation, and 3 generated variation params. Some acceptance criteria appear only partially covered or not evidenced (notably premium export gating/watermark+resolution, premium-only Coming Soon gating, and ensuring variations differ in typography/color).

missing_requirements.requirement: Prompt Mode renders 3 unique card design variations with different layout compositions and different typography/color treatments (not just minor offsets), maintaining strict hierarchy and preventing overlap.
missing_requirements.reason: While 3 variation parameter sets are generated, the diff evidence only shows changes in decorationOffset/vignetteIntensity/glowIntensity/layoutVariant. No evidence that typography pairings or color treatments change per variation (as required), nor evidence that layoutVariant is actually applied in rendering logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply premium export rules to Prompt Mode downloads: free users get limited-resolution export and/or watermark; premium users get HD export and watermark removal; anonymous/demo download still requires sign-in; reuse existing entitlements.
missing_requirements.reason: Although canvas export supports options for resolution and watermark and OutputSection imports/useEntitlements, the diff summary does not show download/export logic that conditionally sets resolution/watermark based on entitlements for Prompt Mode, or preserves the sign-in gating for anonymous users.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add UI placeholders for Video invitation option and Voice message card option in the premium area as Coming Soon items gated behind premium.
missing_requirements.reason: The Coming Soon buttons/toast are implemented, but there is no evidence they are gated behind premium/entitlements (i.e., only shown in premium area or disabled/hidden for non-premium users).

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI/UX redesign and navigation/section styling changes (hero gradients, pricing cards, legal sections formatting, templates/examples section adjustments, new animation hooks/components) beyond the Prompt Studio feature requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not requested by any REQ-1..REQ-11 items (which focus on Prompt Mode, variations, theming, editing, export gating, and coming-soon placeholders).
